name: CourseWithFile
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for creating new course record

Request payload must contain the following fields:

title: STRING,
description: STRING,
thumbnail: FILE

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/mentorCourses/withFile

formdata

Response:

201 - Created 

  {"status":201,"status_type":"success","message":"OK","count":1,"data":[{"created_at":"2022-09-11T16:26:50.867Z","updated_at":"2022-09-11T16:26:50.867Z","thumbnail":"/images/default.jpg","status":"ACTIVE","mentor_course_id":22,"title":"test course1","description":"test desc 1","created_by":40,"updated_by":40}]}
